name: Black Survival: Eternal Return
detailed_description:
What is Black Survival?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/690510/Black_Survival/

Released in 2015, Black Survival is a real-time PvP Battle Royale game played by 10 players on the Black Island, Lumia.

  • It is loved by its beautiful artwork and various characters, and it is constantly updated introducing new stories and characters.
  • In Lumia Island, which is made up of 22 areas, players try to survive as the Test Subjects been kept in there.
  • There are over 200 items on the island, and you can combine them to create over 400 survival items.
  • Avoiding the narrowed-down prohibited areas, the players must craft items with a quick decision to become the last survivor in a competition against the other nine players.
  • All characters have unique skills and main weapons. It is important to choose a weapon suitable for your character to increase its mastery.
  • Black Survival is a game that you can easily enjoy just with a few buttons without any difficult control.

BS:ER inherits the merits of this Black Survival and is a new game in a 3D parallel world.


About the Game

- Eternal Return -

First Victim or Last One...

The test subjects eventually will return once more to the survival game.

Experience the Black Survival in a completely new way!
The new 3D Lumia island will let you live through the survival to its fullest.


  • Explore Lumia Island where abandoned cities and pure nature coexist.
  • There are various materials needed for survival in the entire island. Find them!
  • Be careful, there are many things on this island that might kill you.


  • Over 400 different items await you, but you will have to hurry to find it on time.
  • Combine hatchet and leather to create a battle axe. and combine motor for Bone Crusher.
  • All items are limited, so you must use them efficiently.


  • A variety of Test subjects await you, including the Serial Killer, Jackie, and the clumsy cop, Aya.
  • All Test subjects have their own abilities and masteries. Use them carefully..
  • Depending on the experiment subject you choose, you will have a completely different experience.


  • Keep moving, and you will move much faster due to increased moving masteries.
  • Keep fighting, and you will become stronger than others due to increased fighting masteries.
  • What masteries will you raise first? Make your choice.


  • Remember, only one test subject can become the winner.
  • The stronger does not necessarily win, so take advantage of the situation.
  • Let there be glory to the pawns, who reached the end of despair!

short_description: 'Black Survival: Eternal Return' is the 3D parallel world of Black Survival(2D). Creating a quarter view and point-and-click style gameplay, this new title is bringing back its unique searching and crafting strategies in the natural 3D parallel world of Black Survival.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 9xxx / ATI 2xxx
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on an SSD improves loading times.
